channel.title: Please Read
channel.description:
I Know I shouldn't post this, but oh well.. [center][size=20pt][b]BE APPROPRIATE![/b][/size][/center]
[size=13pt][b]THERE[/b][/size] are kids and young adults who use these forums. All I wanted to say was stop with the innapropriate language. I See a lot of stuff about perverted things, sex, orgasms, etc. Yeah, [size=20pt]STOP WITH IT![/size]
[size=13pt][b]I KNOW[/b][/size] that most of you follow the forum rules. And I just think that the people who are posting this sick stuff should get temp. banned or at least a warning.
[size=13pt][b]REMEMBER[/b][/size] this forum is non-private server related! You must use [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/]Moparscape.org[/url] to talk about Moparscape.
[size=13pt][b]SORRY[/b][/size] that I posted this, but I can't stand the people talk about sick, perveted, nasty stuff!
Sincerely -cabby
